GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: retrieves an article object by its article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: retrieves array of all comments by its article id

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: retrieves an object of a posted comment

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: retrieves an object of update article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: retrieves an empty body of deleted comment
